Name: ZYTERNION
About the game: ZYTERNION has fallen. Your mission is to survive and be the last fighter standing. Upgrade your ship with power-ups and battle your friends in competitive local multiplayer! 2 to 4 player local multiplayer! Fun and fast-paced party game! Easy controls! 25+ unique maps! Maps will be randomly chosen from a pool to enhance replay value! Black Hole map that will alter time!
